text: A Song Is Born is a 1948 American musical movie directed by Howard Hawks and is the remake of the 1941 movie Ball of Fire. It was based on the short story From A to Z. It stars Danny Kaye, Virginia Mayo, Benny Goodman, Tommy Dorsey, Louis Armstrong, Lionel Hampton, Mel Powell, Louis Bellson, Charlie Barnet and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * *A Song is Born at TCM * * Category:1948 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:American movie remakes Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks
title: A Song Is Born
